# gamefabric_volumes (Data Source)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `environment` (String) The name of the environment the object belongs to.

### Optional

- `label_filter` (Map of String) A map of keys and values that is used to filter volumes.

### Read-Only

- `volumes` (Attributes List) Volumes is a list of volumes in the environment that match the labels filter. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--volumes))

<a id="nestedatt--volumes"></a>
### Nested Schema for `volumes`

Read-Only:

- `environment` (String) The name of the environment the object belongs to.
- `name` (String) The unique object name within its scope.
